Chapters.Title: Lucy Thinks Ricky is Trying to Murder Her

Item.Title: The Handcuffs: 1955 Repeat (Open & Close)
Item.Description: "The Handcuffs" was repeated on June 27, 1955 - the final broadcast of the series' fourth season. Roy Rowan appeared at the end of the broadcast, saying goodbye for the summer and inviting viewers to watch their summer-replacement program: Those Whiting Girls, a Desilu comedy starring Margaret and Barbara Whiting.
